definitions: insert pages, typically blank ones, between the pages of (a book)

examples.text: books of maps interleaved with tracing paper

definitions: place something between the layers of (something)

examples.text: pasta interleaved with strips of zucchini and carrot

definitions: mix (two or more digital signals) by alternating between them.
shortDefinitions: mix digital signals by alternating between them

definitions: divide (memory or processing power) between a number of tasks by allocating segments of it to each task in turn

examples.text: memory is automatically interleaved as additional memory cards are added

shortDefinitions: divide memory or processing power between several tasks by allocating segments of it to each task in turn
